page.title: 13North Yorkshire village life
page.content: Back at home everyone has now left the house except me. After clearing away the breakfast things,I have a bath & dress in jeans & shirt. With the family away at school all day & having taken a packed lunch of sandwiches, fruit & a biscuit,the main meal of the day is prepared for the evening. The tendency is towards healthy eating although some of the fattier foods are still considered acceptable. On special occasions the family may go out for a meal. This will normally consist of three or four courses & can cost anything between eight & eighteen pounds per person depending on the venue & if wine is served. After the evening meal is over,the chidren may have some homework to do. They go into their rooms & manage to complete their work amid the offbeat sounds of todays pop music".
